Name: OLI
About the game: *Game does not have support to controller* Do you believe in dreams ? OLI its a brazilian indie short 2D game with a dark and mysterious setting. In this game you play as Oliver, a boy who is looking for a way out of an inhospitable city, for that he will have to go through some challenges and different locations of this place to find out what is happening and finish this nightmare. OLI is composed of simple mechanics, which are: WALK - keys A and D of the keyboard. JUMP - Key ESPACE of the keyboard. INTERACT WITH OBJECTS - keys J or K (depending on the situation).
Meta Title: OLI: Mar 29, 2022, Nikolas Guedes da Silva and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on OLI? Check out the release date (Mar 29, 2022), developer insights from Nikolas Guedes da Silva, and a complete game summary.
